data.ATTRIBUTE_DESC: {{boName}} ID: The identifier to as the primary key for this row.
UNIQUE {{boName}} IDENTIFIER: A unique name, code or number designated.
{{boName}} NAME: Name assigned to the {{boName}}. This may be the legal or registered name as it appears on a permit or a given name assigned by the operator.
{{boName}} NAME: The alias name assigned to the {{boName}}.
AREA IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for the area.
AREA NAME:The name of the Area
FIELD IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for the field.
FIELD NAME:The name of the FIELD.  Must be unique among all FIELDS in the system.
POOL IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for the pool.
POOL NAME: The pool name.
NETWORK NODE NAME: The name of the network node.
PLATFORM IDENTIFIER: Unique number assigned to the offshore drilling platform or onshore drilling pad...
PLATFORM NAME: Full name of the man-made structure installed to support drilling and production operations.
LEASE NAME: Name assigned to the lease by the regulatory agency with jurisdiction over the minerals in the area where the lease is located.
LEASE NUMBER: Number assigned to the lease by the regulatory agency with jurisdiction over the minerals in the area where the lease is located.
OFFSHORE INDICATOR: A Y or N flag indicating whether this {{boName}} is onshore or offshore.
ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y or N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently either active/valid (Y) or inactive/invalid (N).
{{boName}} OWNER: Owner assigned to the {{boName}}.
SPUD DATE: Date the drilling operations commenced on the {{boName}}. The first day hole is made.
COMPLETION DATE: Date on the official filing or completion report indicating the {{boName}} is established as ready to produce, inject or abandon.
PRODUCTION START DATE: Date the {{boName}} started to product.
X COORDINATE UNIT: The unit of the measure of X coordinate.
Y COORDINATE UNIT: The unit of the measure of Y coordinate.
COORDINATE REFERENCE SYSTEM ID: the identifier of coordinate reference systerm.
COORDINATE REFERENCE SYSTEM: coordinate-based local, regional or global system used to locate geographical entities.
PRODUCTION METHOD IDENTIFIER: the unique number assigned to production method.
PRODUCTION_METHOD: The method of product ion. For example swabbing, flowing, pumping or gas lift.
{{boName}} TYPE IDENTIFIER: The unique number assingned to {{boName}} type.

{{boName}} TYPE: Identify the types of a {{boName}} commonly based on Ministry of Natural Resource and Forestry, such as OIL, Natural Gas, Oil and gas {{boName}}, Injection, Historical Injection, Natural gas sgorage, Dosposal.

CURRENT {{boName}} CLASS: REFERENCE {{boName}} CLASSIFICATION: A reference table identifying the classification of a {{boName}} commonly based on the Lahee system. For example New Field Wildcat, Deeper Pool Test, Outpost or Development. Use only if needed.
{{boName}} CLASSIFICATION: A reference table identifying the classification of a {{boName}} commonly based on the Lahee system. For example New Field Wildcat, Deeper Pool Test, Outpost or Development
CURRENT {{boName}} STATUS:This reference table defines the status of the {{boName}}. For example: cased, spudded, licensed, dry, abandoned oil, gas, ï¿½,Use only if needed.
{{boName}} STATUS NAME: This reference table defines the status of the {{boName}}. For example: cased, spudded, licensed, dry, abandoned oil, gas,
CURRENT STATUS DATE: Date of the current status of the {{boName}}.
DEEPEST DEPTH UNIT: The unit of the deepest measure depth.
MAXIMUM TRUE VERTICAL DEPTH OUOM: Maximum true vertical depth original unit of measure.
DEPTH DATUM ID: The unique number of the depth datum, the point from which all depths are measured.
DEPTH DATUM: The point from which all depths are measured. For example: kelly bushing, ground level, barge floor
DEPTH DATUM ELEVATION OUOM: Depth Datum Elevation original unit of measure.
GROUND ELEVATION OUOM: Ground elevation original unit of measure.
BUSINESS ASSOCIATE IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for a business associate, such as a person, company, regulatory agency, government or consortium.
BA NAME: The name assigned to the business associate.
PLOT SYMBOL: A character or symbol used to represent {{boName}} status. This may be a particular mapping package coding scheme, or a pointer to other application dependent files.
ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
X/Y of surface, which can hold a geographical latitude/longitude or projected X/Y depending on the value of CRS, which can be either a projected CRS or geographical datum.
X/Y of surface, which can hold a geographical latitude/longitude or projected X/Y depending on the value of CRS, which can be either a projected CRS or geographical datum.
{{boName}} DEEPEST DEPTH: The deepest measure depth of the {{boName}}.
MAXIMUM TRUE VERTICAL DEPTH: The maximum true vertical depth from the surface datum reference to the final total depth or deepest point, measured on a straight line.
DEPTH DATUM ELEVATION: Operator reported elevation of the measurement datum used as a reference for other measured {{boName}} points.
GROUND ELEVEVATION: The elevation of the ground at the {{boName}} site.
